alert.note: Alert for McPherson; Reno; Rice; Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 12 at 9:30PM CDT until April 12 at 10:45PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... McPherson County in central Kansas... Northeastern Reno County in south central Kansas... Eastern Rice County in central Kansas... Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 1045 PM CDT. * At 929 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Cambria to 5 miles north of Abbyville, moving east at 20 mph. This warning replaces the previous severe thunderstorm warnings that are in effect for the warned areas. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Salina, Hutchinson, Mcpherson, Lindsborg, South Hutchinson, Inman, Buhler, Nickerson, Galva, Marquette, Little River, Assaria, Gypsum, Smolan, Windom, New Cambria, Falun, Willowbrook, Salina Airport and Mcpherson Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 52 and 95. Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 250 and 266. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
